column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I really like to take the bus when I have to run errands .
#text=There is a bus stop right outside of my apartment building .
#text=When I have to go to the store , I wait at the bus stop .
#text=When the bus pulls up , I pay the bus fare using quarters .
#text=It costs six quarters to ride the bus .
#text=The bus makes lots of different stops before it gets to the grocery store , so I am on it for several minutes .
#text=Sometimes other people on the bus will say hello and we will have a small conversation .
#text=When I get to the store and finish shopping , I wait at another bus stop so I can go home .
#text=I pay the bus fare again , sit in my seat and patiently wait for the bus to get to my apartment .
#text=When it stops in front of my apartment , I get off the bus and go inside .
